content: a crochet pattern with easy stitches and repetitive row it s called down the rabbit hole because once you get started you just want to keep going and you might never stop not that the pattern is hard no it just might be a bit addictive and you may well be drawn into a spiral of wanting to continue to make another one and another one and another one… **yarn choice & shawl size** i used the hobbii rainbow cotton 8/4 about 8 skeins in total a fingering yarn i used a 3 5 mm hook e / 4 hook color a army green 3 skeins color b pearl gray 2 skeins color c rust 3 skeins measurements after blocking tip to base 203 cm or 80 inches bas top side 106 cm or 42 inches diagonal 218 cm or 86 inches **video tutorial** the first of five videos in the free crochet video tutorial series is live from 31st of march 2023 the following four videos will be released one every friday for the next for weeks on my youtube channel find more info on my website **unisex pattern** us crochet terms wearable for both men women teens kids and everyone else too unisex design and with different yarn choices the ways to vary are endless **free pattern** pattern available for free on my website 1 a prettier printable version of the pattern with step-by-step photo tutorial for the 2trctog & 3trctog and charts is available for purchase here by buying the pattern you also support me as a designer and i appreciate that a lot **crochet shawl pattern includes ** a designed pdf pattern with written instructions english us terms complete chart for the main pattern charts for the edge so you know how to work the different stitches tips regarding your yarn choice and other good to know tips stitch count for all 166 main pattern row and stitch counts for the star parts on the edge row measurements and matching drawing for the size of the shawl step by step instructions for 2trctog stitches step by step instructions for 3trctog stitches video on how to weave in ends is available
